conclusion: FAILED - Weighted sensor loss WORSE than baseline. Score 1.0131 vs 1.1688 (-0.1557), Time 90.7 min vs 58.4 min. Optimizing weighted RMSE leads to different solutions than unweighted RMSE we're scored on.
recommendation: ABANDON - loss_function family should be marked FAILED. Optimizing a different loss function doesn't help when scored on the original.
